isis.stitle: TSI 03-12-18 - Production and service calibration history and new service calibration PRC2BV02 for the Diamond Logic™ engine controller

subjectgroup.subject: Production and service calibration history and new service calibration PRC2BV02 for the Diamond Logic™ engine controller

configure.engfam: T 444E 1419278 - Up for all current models and ratings

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death or damage to the engine or vehicle, make sure the transmission is in neutral, the parking brake is set, and wheels are blocked before doing diagnostic or service procedures on the engine or vehicle. Read all safety instructions in the "Safety Information" section of the Engine Service Manual or Engine Diagnostics Manual.

geninfo.para: PRC2AN00 - Released for production wastegated engines
PRC2BV00 - Released for production and service to correct the function of the Self Test Input (STI) switch and to add diagnostic capabilities using the Electronic Service Tool (EST)

item.para: PRC2BV00 allows the STI switch to clear Service Indicator (SI) features, Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs), and do the Key-On Engine-Off (KOEO) Test.

When using the EST- with MasterDiagnostics® software - the numerical order, not the firing order, is the test sequence for the Key-On Engine-Off (KOEO) injector (buzz) test. The test sequence with PRC2AN00 is the firing order.
The Key-On Engine-Running (KOER) Cylinder Contribution Test was modified to reduce erroneous cylinder DTCs.
The EST - with MasterDiagnostics® software - can be used to check signal voltage values while running the Continuos Monitor Test and doing operational diagnostic tests using breakout harnesses.

geninfo.para: PRC2BV01- is the current production calibration. PRC2BV01 corrected a PRC2BV00 error message indicating that the particulate trap needs service, causing the warn lamp to turn on.

item.para: If you reprogram the Diamond Logic™ engine controller, you will receive PRC2BV02.
If you have PRC2BV01 and you do not have an engine under run condition, you will not gain anything by programming to PRC2BV02.

geninfo.para: PRC2BV02- Released for service only to reduce engine under run conditions with Allison 2000 series transmissions

svcproc.title: Procedures using STI Switch
svcproc.para: Use the STI switch on the dash - labeled Engine Diagnostics.
Clearing SI features - Fuel used, miles, and hours - when the Change Oil Lamp (COL) is illuminated
Steps 1- 3 must be done within 10 seconds.

step1.para: Turn the ignition switch to ON. (Do not start engine.)
Depress and release the Engine Diagnostics button twice.
Depress and hold the Engine Diagnostics button for 3 seconds.

svcproc.para: The COL lamp will turn off; it will turn on when the next oil change is due.

step1.para: Depress and hold the Engine Diagnostics button.
Turn the ignition switch to ON. (Do not start engine.)
Depress and release the accelerator pedal three times.
Depress and hold the Engine Diagnostics button.
Turn the ignition switch to ON. (Do not start engine.)
